name: Oven-Baked Cheese Crackers
author: T&J
summary: I enjoy making this recipe as a kid and enjoy teaching it to my kids as well. I will serve it straight from the pan or disposable plates. This recipe was handed down to me from a family friend, who passed it on to me and I'm passing it on to everyone.
directions: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C)
Arrange crackers in 1 layer on a baking sheet, keeping space between each cracker
Fold each piece of American cheese in half and fold each half in half, creating 24 squares
Place 1 cheese square on top of each cracker
Bake in the preheated oven until cheese is melted, 3 to 5 minutes
Allow crackers to cool before serving
